word_mean: 退缩，后缩，缩回：向后拉的作用，被拉向后的状态
通常伴有正牙装置的牙齿的远中运动

sentence.Network_en: He demanded a full retraction of the allegations against him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他要求完全收回针对他的言论。

sentence.Network_en: The newspaper published a retraction of the erroneous report.
sentence.Network_cn: 那家报纸声明撤回那篇错误的报道.

sentence.Network_en: Miss Pearce said she expected an unqualified retraction of his comments within twenty four hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 皮尔斯小姐说她希望他在24小时内无条件收回他的评论。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... retract v 缩进；退缩 retraction n 缩进；撤回 sudtract v 减去；扣除.
retinoscopy 视网膜镜检查retraction 退缩-
在拓扑学中,收缩(retraction),顾名思义是将整个空间收缩到一个子空间;形变收缩(deformation retraction)是将空间「连续收缩」成一个子空间的映射。.
水利工程专业英语 - 河林的日志 - 网易博客 ... residual oil， 余油 retraction， 回缩 run， 运行.

list.abs: retraction 退缩retraction ring 收缩环retractor 牵开器缩肌
1 2 3 4 5 ... 可收放的起落架^ retractable landing gear 活动铅笔^ retractable pencil 钢卷尺^ retractable steel rule.
retractable backup arm 可复位推靠臂retractable bit 伸缩式钻头retractable core bit 可收缩取出的取心钻头.
retention time 停留时间retraction stress 收缩应力reversible change 可逆变化

entry.tran: 收回，撤回(所说的话或写的东西)
entry.def: If you retract something that you have said or written, you say that you did not mean it.

example.ex: Mr Smith hurriedly sought to retract the statement, but it had just been broadcast on national radio...
example.tran: 史密斯先生想赶快收回这项声明，但它刚刚已经在国家电台播出了。

example.ex: He's hoping that if he makes me feel guilty, I'll retract.
example.tran: 他指望着如果他能让我感到内疚，我就会收回所说的话。

entry.def: When a part of a machine or a part of a person's body retracts or is retracted, it moves inwards or becomes shorter.

example.ex: Torn muscles retract, and lose strength, structure, and tightness.
example.tran: 撕裂的肌肉会收缩，丧失原来的力量、结构和紧实度。
当飞机的轮子收起来的时候

means.word_mean: 1. a disavowal or taking back of a previous assertion
2. the act of pulling or holding or drawing a part back;

auth_sentence.content: I have repeatedly asked for your retraction or explanation.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have repeatedly asked for your retraction or explanation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have repeatedly asked for your retraction or explanation.

auth_sentence.content: His response was an immediate public apology - and a partial retraction.
auth_sentence.res_content: His response was an immediate public apology - and a partial retraction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His response was an immediate public apology - and a partial retraction.

auth_sentence.content: Retraction notices are often not accurate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Retraction notices are often not accurate.
